findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Owner can change the tax, burn, marketing and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify fees, which could lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Owner can change maxFreeAmount and extraFee value
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify maxFreeAmount and extraFee values.

findings.title: Owner can change the maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to exclude themselves from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change Uniswap router address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the Uniswap router address.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
